title: 原来mcchina.tk使用sf.net建的，搭建千万不要捐款
author: leavessoft
txt_content:
本帖最后由 leavessoft 于 2013-6-25 15:00 编辑 

请查看：http://mcchina.tk/image/default/ ... F00/FFFFFF/");




截图04.jpg (16.86 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2013-6-25 14:55 上传








截图07.jpg (5.76 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2013-6-25 14:59 上传




话说我发现了一个可以用于注入的漏洞
An error has been encountered in accessing this page.

1. Server: mcchina.tk 
2. URL path: /image/default/simsun.ttc/1/FFFF00/FFFFFF/鈥�); 
3. Error notes: NONE 
4. Error type: 404 
5. Request method: GET 
6. Request query string: NONE 
7. Time: 2013-06-25 06:52:33 UTC (1372143153)

Reporting this problem: The problem you have encountered is with a project web site hosted by SourceForge.net. This issue should be reported to the SourceForge.net-hosted project (not to SourceForge.net).

If this is a severe or recurring/persistent problem, please do one of the following, and provide the error text (numbered 1 through 7, above):

Contact the project via their designated support resources.
Contact the project administrators of this project via email (see the upper right-hand corner of the Project Summary page for their usernames) at user-name@users.sourceforge.net
If you are a maintainer of this web content, please refer to the Site Documentation regarding web services for further assistance.

NOTE: As of 2008-10-23 directory index display has been disabled by default. This option may be re-enabled by the project by placing a file with the name ".htaccess" with this line:

Options +Indexes
也就是说，mcchina.tk是用sf.net免费搭建的，更本不需要钱（所以它才会提供无限的图标上传服务）。

replies.author: a1486077529
replies.txt_content:
leavessoft 发表于 2013-6-25 15:03 
有趣了啊~~
这样可以输入99999999字节的东西
哦- -

replies.author: jack950703
replies.txt_content:
嘛，我是mcchina.tk的作者

1. 首先挂在sf.net不代表不能申请赞助吧?
2. 这个项目已经Marked as deprecated了，目前整站已经搬迁至http://mc.whitegem.net/
3. 然后您是否知道Apache等Web服务器是有GET长度限制的?

replies.author: zhouyiran2
replies.txt_content:
jack950703 发表于 2013-6-25 15:39 
嘛，我是mcchina.tk的作者

1. 首先挂在sf.net不代表不能申请赞助吧?
内容和头像很般配啊！（毫无贬低的含义）

replies.author: 黄凯航
replies.txt_content: 话说即使网站服务器是免费的，MC服务器可能是租的啊。。。

replies.author: jack950703
replies.txt_content: 另: 请问何为注入, 这个站没有任何的SQL操作.
